post.body: LOL either that or she totally forgot :p
yikes. Good luck with that. And I think I have as many staples that didn't make it in over that did.
LOL. Only if you show me around, too! (I really have been trying to get Tim totake me to Scotland before I go home)
what about hobbes?
I'll need to see him in action as the Doctor first.
I don't either, but I have friends who would
yeah, I'm trying not to say the guy's name incase people don't want to know in my twitter and facebook updates
sent you a message via twitter...i didn't want to spoil it for people and have it go into my twitter stream :)
Oh, he's not as cute as DT, but he's got something to him....though he reminds me of Marc Warren.
not really. I've seen him in the two movies with Billie Piper and that's it.
I'm planning on crying, myself.
just slipcovered the sofa and used a carpenter's stapler. My arms HURT
washing hair in bathtub doesn't work.
*watches fandom explode....or is that implode?*
At least he's been in something with Billie already ;)
Not spoiling for people who don't want to know, but if you don't know yet and want to know, let me know.
Okay then. Only seen the new doctor a few times in things....shocked...but he's kind of good looking. We'll see what he does, I guess.
The Doctor is going to be YOUNGER than me?! Oh dear.
The new Doctor is going to be the youngest doctor yet? And Moff says he's unknown...
Walker's Prawn Cocktail crisps are marked with the "Safe for Vegetarians" sticker.
